code: import React,{useState}from"react";import style from"./Paginator.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let Paginator=props=>{let totalItemsCount=props.totalUsersCount;let portionSize=Math.max(props.pageSize,9);let pagesUpload=Math.ceil(totalItemsCount/portionSize);let portionCount=Math.min(pagesUpload,props.maxSize);let[portionNumber,setPortionNumber]=useState(1);let leftPortion=(portionNumber-1)*portionSize+1;let rightPortion=portionNumber*portionSize;const pages=[];for(let i=1;i<=portionCount;i++){pages.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:style.pageList,children:[portionNumber>1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setPortionNumber(portionNumber-1);},children:"PREV"}),pages.filter(page=>page>=leftPortion&&page<=rightPortion).map(page=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:props.currentPage===page&&style.selectedPage,onClick:event_obrabotchik=>{props.onPageChanged(page);},children:page});}),portionCount>portionNumber&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setPortionNumber(portionNumber+1);},children:"NEXT"})]});};export default Paginator;
